issue.title: [Packaging] Adjust conda package scripts to account for Parquet codebase migration
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3181](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3181). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The parquet-cpp package is not necessary in these builds after ARROW-3075

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3181?focusedCommentId=16613391) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
`[~wesmckinn]` Should I convert parquet-cpp to a meta package which installs arrow-cpp?

Users might have pinned parquet-cpp as well in their environment, which can raise conflicts for newer arrow releases.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3181?focusedCommentId=16615250) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
